name: Promised Area
description:
The game should work both in full screen and in vignette mode, but for a better visual experience, I recommend enjoying it full screen.

Designer：Min Ni  （ljbhnm@gmail.com）

music：Godspeed You! Black Emperor - East Hastings

This is a Cthulhu style game with a concept derived from scp

The game is illogical, emotional and full of unknowns

I didn't create this game for a huge purpose, just to miss my mother and to vent the stress of bullshit work.

But it still has a more complete set up and the freedom to choose whether you enter or not this unnamed world from the wardrobe and interact with the entities that represent me or your inner world, I will add some images (generated by Disco diffusion) as I go along, but not many, because I want to show an abstract world through something more abstract than words .
